channel.title: Posts on Gate of the Reach, Fear Under The Mountain!
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Gate of the Reach, Fear Under The Mountain!

item.title: Narrinesh the Monk
item.description: Introduction In the year 1400, Narrinesh the Dragonborn Rogueish Monk of the Astral Self and sworn vegetarian, was one of the four heroes of legend to foil the Necromancer’s plans in the Gate of the Reach fortress under the mountain. Click here to visit the main page!

item.title: Luth Amastacia
item.description: Introduction In the year 1400, Luth Amastacia, a Half-Elf Pact of the Blade Warlock bound to a flaming Aspect of Corellon, was one of the four heroes of legend to foil the Necromancer’s plans in the Gate of the Reach fortress under the mountain.

item.title: Stuu the Dwarf
item.description: Introduction In the year 1400, Stuu the Dwarf, an Oath of the Ancients Paladin and cook of the highest order, was one of the four heroes of legend to foil the Necromancer’s plans in the Gate of the Reach fortress under the mountain. Appearance Stuu the Dwarf … Deeds Act 1 Act 2 Act 3 Aftermath The Resurrection Mechanism within the Corrupted Unity Stone was prematurely activated, before all four pieces of the Torch of the Reach were plugged in.

item.title: Nirvana Knives
item.description: Introduction In the year 1400, Nirvana Knives, a Tiefling Soul Knife Rogue, was one of the four heroes of legend that foiled the Necromancer’s plans in the Gate of the Reach fortress under the mountain. At once a self-determined rogue and calculating leader, Nirvana would stop at nothing to achieve her own desires, believing the ends always justify the means. She relentlessly pursued this path, at times, against the wishes of her own friends and companions to see her greater vision achieved.
